channel.title: What The Hell
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "What The Hell" - A major glitch with my char...

item.title: Re: What The Hell
item.content:encoded: Hm, I posted that logged in, but it came out as Anon. weird. Anyway, yeah. Please2ReportExploitsForGloriousFunRevolutionkthxbye.

item.title: Re: What The Hell
item.content:encoded:
This, however, *is* McM.

First- yes, your character was glitched. It's all better now. We're still working on why that happens, it is super rare. Let us know if you did anything 'clever' before it got borked.

Second - you really should report exploits that you find. We -do- give commensurate rewards - we've even made custom items for players that find truly epic bugs, items that launch them into the top tier of the game.

If you DON'T report an exploit, however, and someone else does, and we see that you've been using it (easy to find, what with logs and all), you get banned. So, your call - free shinys, or bannination.

Third - since your character didn't have 'tonsofdropsLOL' on it, nor did any character we've searched that you've had contact with, I'm not sure you are as monster-filled as you say. There IS two ways to get tons of drops, however: Be a Leader, or be the only person in your village with Terri 3. Both will get you a drop every time. :)

item.title: Re: What The Hell
item.content:encoded: Not likely MCM unless he lives in Ontario, Canada

item.title: Re: What The Hell
item.content:encoded:
Looks to me that your character was deleted. I have two people on my sparring list who have been deleted, and the same thing happened with them.

Either you haven't played in 60 days, or your account got deleted for whatever reason. I suppose you did say that you found a 'cheat' to get easy monster drops…

EDIT: is the anon above my post McM? *points to his first sentence*

item.title: Re: What The Hell
item.content:encoded: The joy of logs. Remember that BvS is still pretty small. Cheating is pretty much impossible. Only like 3-4 people have a complete monster set anyways.

item.title: Re: What The Hell
item.content:encoded: Who would report something cool like that? lol. Only someone 100% stupid would report something like that. "Wow thank you for reporting that here is one free item that gives a small bonus as a gift!" Wow thats great. Not. So report and get a small item or keep and use till u get all the monster drops then wait a few days/weeks after that and then report it.

item.title: Re: What The Hell
item.content:encoded: wow. BvS rolled a 1 on your character

item.title: Re: What The Hell
item.content:encoded: Nah, I'm bored of the game anyway. Kinda repeative and I found a cheat to get a Kaiju Drop with ease…

item.title: Re: What The Hell
item.content:encoded:
Just create an alt and send a bug report. It's happened to others before, I'm fairly certain.

No need to quit the game because of that.

item.title: What The Hell
item.content:encoded: My char suddenly got… Crashed or something. Try looking up for NikolaSama in BvS. You'll get a chuckle. Looks like I'm ending this game.
